name: Festival Tycoon: Soundcheck
description:
Festival Tycoon: Soundcheck is a two-level preview of Festival Tycoon, an upcoming game about designing and running the worlds’ greatest music festival. Glastonbury, shmastonbury. The future of live entertainment is in your capable hands.



Put your bargaining skills and musical taste to the test by hiring a range of bands across the likes of folk, rock and techno. Many bands expect special treatment and will flounce out if things don’t go their way.





Place tents, glamorous stages, toilets, festival decorations and more in the optimum formation for guest happiness! Remember to keep the crowds at bay with efficient railings - lest chaos reign.





Appease sponsors like banks, record labels and drink companies for grants. Beware: if you don’t meet their terms, there will be consequences!





Keep everybody happy, or risk getting trashed on social media.





Wishlist the full game now! Coming to Early Access 2021!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1326270/Festival_Tycoon/
